page.title: 08EVENTS-COUSLAND GALA DAY
page.content: ON THE THIRD SATURDAY IN JUNE THE VILLAGE GALA TAKES PLACE.THE EVENT BEGINS AT 1.30.PM.WHEN THE PARADE OF VILLAGERS,LED BY A PIPE BAND,WALKS FROM THE VILLAGE HALL TO THE FIELD. THE FIRST EVENT IS THE JUDGING OF THE FANCY DRESS COMPETITION,WHICH WAS WON IN 1985 BY MARINA MIDDLEMASS,AS CINDERELLA,JENNIFER MACKAY,AS A PUPPET AND WILLIAM NICKLAS AS A TREE. THE DRYSDALE CUP COMPETITION IS IN MEMORY OF JOHN DRYSDALE, WHO IN VICTORIAN TIMES,WAS THE COACHMAN FOR THE VILLAGE COACH TO DALKEITH.IN 1985 A PAINTING COMPETITION ON THE TOPIC OF SPORT WAS WON BY MARK MCNAUGHT AND LEWIS HODGKINSON. EVENTS AND STALLS ARE PLANTS,CAKE AND CANDY,POTTERY,PAINTINGS,RAFFLES,TEA IN THE TENT,DONKEY RIDES,ICE-CREAM AND HAMBURGERS.CHILDREN,MUMS,DADS AND EVEN THE BAND RUN RACES FOR MONEY PRIZES.
